action.title: STUN GUN
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 each player’s paddle is equipped
 with a stun gun.

Player would have to try and
 stun the opponent player by shooting a
 blaster at the opponent.

If either of the players collides with the
 stun blaster shot from the opponent’s paddle,
 the player will not be able to move their paddle for
 1 seconds

action.title: SHRINK THE PADDLE
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 an shrink obsacle would be moving
 up and down the center of the play area.

If the player hits the ball and the
 ball collides the shrink obsacle at the
 center of the play area, the
 opponent player’s paddle will shrink obsacle
 and vice versa

action.title: THROUGH THE PORTAL
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 2 portals randomly appear at the 
both side of the screen.

If the ball passes through one portal
 it shoots out through another portal.

action.title: SHADOW MODE
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 a shadow obsacle will be seen moving
 up and down at the center of the play area.

If the player hits the ball and the
 ball collides with the shadow obsacle,
 player paddle becomes invisible for 2 second

action.title: BLACK HOLE
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 1 blackhole will spawn on each of the
 player’s play area randomly
 at the start of the game.

If the ball collides with the
 blackhole obsacle, then the player that
 last hit the ball loses the round and
 the opponent gains a point.

action.title: REVERSE MODE
action.description:
In this gameplay mode,
 all the controls are reversed.

If the player wants to move the paddle up,
 they should press down arrow key on the PC
 or swipe down on the phone and
 vice-versa for moving the paddle down.

classic.title: NORMAL MODE
classic.description:
This will be simply a blank
 game board with no obstacle
 in-between the paddle

classic.title: DIAMOND MODE
classic.description:
In this Board, there will be a
 diamond-shaped obstacle at the
 center of the play area.

 If the ball collides with the
 diamond-shaped obstacle, the ball gets
 deflected off from the
 diamond-shaped obstacle.

classic.title: PARALLEL MODE
classic.description:
In this board, there will be
 2 lines placed horizontally facing
 each other at the center of the screen.

If the ball collides with
 the parallel horizontal obstacle,
 the ball gets deflected off 
from the Horizontal obstacles.
